items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The price is âœ…ï¸
items.body: So cute! Fits nicely and it's so comfortable. I loved it...perfect for my friendsgiving. Read more
items.author: Karla Perez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute & Swiftie approved!
items.body: I had a Taylor Swift themed event and decided to give this dress a try. Itâ€™s so cute! You can wear it with the v-neck or wear it the other way and have it full coverage. The length was great even on my 5â€™10â€ frame. I recommend wearing some short under it for extra coverage though. The fabric is comfy and I had no issues with it. The sequins will get caught on themselves and others. My mom had a sequin shirt on and we couldnâ€™t touch arms without getting stuck to each other. Read more
items.author: Crystal

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks cute but cheap material
items.body: The dress looks cute on and fits well but the material is cheap and sequence falls off. Its probably a one time use dress for me. I bought an XL my normal size. Read more
items.author: Annette Martinez

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty oversized sequin dress
items.body: This dress was pretty but it ran very big. I got the size small. I wouldnâ€™t have minded the oversized look but it looked sloppy rather than just oversized. I did however love the color of the dress but the shape was less than flattering. Was it comfortable? yes. Great value for the item? Yes. It just did not flatter me. For reference I am 5â€™3â€ 115 pounds. Read more
items.author: Smiley D

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Had high hopes - immediately sad
items.body: This dress is completely sheer. There was no lining. No amount of undergarment will be cute. Also the sequins came out of the package sticking to each other and causing snags. Immediate return Read more
items.author: Jennifer Hall

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply beautiful- you wonâ€™t be disappointed.!
items.body: I purchased this colorful sparkly dress to wear to a disco bachelorette party. It was perfect for that. I had more compliments on it than Iâ€™ve ever had in one night.. the dress is lined and the quality of the material was top-notch IMO. I didnâ€™t have any sequins get snagged and tore off, which is a huge plus. It wasnâ€™t overly heavy. It was super hot out that day and night, and I wasnâ€™t uncomfortable from wearing it- Iâ€™m fussy about that kind of stuff. However, I was uncomfortable for two or three days after dancing in 4 inch chunky heels that Iâ€™m not used to wearing.ðŸ˜… The colors of the dress sparkled amazingly. Such a fun dress to wear, and I donâ€™t like to wear dresses.. I am 5â€™3 & this one specifically sat right above my knees. I believe it fits true to the sizing chart. Iâ€™m keeping it in my closet until I can find another reason to wear it!!ðŸ¤© Read more
items.author: Kelly J.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress it up or dress it down.
items.body: What a gorgeous dress. The color is stunning. Fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Stephanie Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dress!
items.body: I LOVE this dress! It is absolutely stunning! I got for a semi-formal event in a couple of weeks. It is so festive and comfortable and even more gorgeous than in the pictures! Get it!! Read more
items.author: Jennifer L. Millican

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gold, Silver, Pink, Silver(with Gold), Purple, Black (With Multicolor), Black(with Gold Blue), Black, Black(with Silver). If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
